mainEvents.title: Birth of Jesus
mainEvents.text: She will give birth to a son, and you are to give him the name Jesus.

mainEvents.title: Sermon on the Mount
mainEvents.text: Blessed are the poor in spirit, for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.

mainEvents.title: Crucifixion and Resurrection
mainEvents.text: He is not here; he has risen, just as he said.

mainEvents.title: Pentecost
mainEvents.text: All of them were filled with the Holy Spirit and began to speak in other tongues.

mainEvents.title: Peter's Sermon
mainEvents.text: Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ.

mainEvents.title: Paul's Conversion
mainEvents.text: Saul, Saul, why do you persecute me?... Now get up and go into the city.

mainEvents.title: Justification by Faith
mainEvents.text: For we maintain that a person is justified by faith apart from the works of the law.

mainEvents.title: Life in the Spirit
mainEvents.text: There is now no condemnation for those who are in Christ Jesus.

mainEvents.title: Unity in the Church
mainEvents.text: I appeal to you, brothers and sisters, in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, that all of you agree with one another.

mainEvents.title: Love Chapter
mainEvents.text: Love is patient, love is kind...

mainEvents.title: Ministry of Reconciliation
mainEvents.text: God reconciled us to himself through Christ and gave us the ministry of reconciliation.

mainEvents.title: Paul's Suffering
mainEvents.text: Five times I received from the Jews the forty lashes minus one...

mainEvents.title: Fruit of the Spirit
mainEvents.text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, forbearance, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, gentleness and self-control.

mainEvents.title: Freedom in Christ
mainEvents.text: It is for freedom that Christ has set us free.

mainEvents.title: John the Baptist Prepares the Way
mainEvents.text: John appeared, baptizing in the wilderness and proclaiming a baptism of repentance.

mainEvents.title: Miracles of Jesus
mainEvents.text: He took her by the hand and said to her, 'Talitha koum!'

mainEvents.title: The Last Supper
mainEvents.text: Take it; this is my body.

mainEvents.title: Birth of John the Baptist
mainEvents.text: Your wife Elizabeth will bear you a son, and you are to call him John.

mainEvents.title: Parable of the Good Samaritan
mainEvents.text: A Samaritan, as he traveled, came where the man was; and when he saw him, he took pity on him.

mainEvents.title: Ascension of Jesus
mainEvents.text: While he was blessing them, he left them and was taken up into heaven.

mainEvents.title: Wedding at Cana
mainEvents.text: He thus revealed his glory, and his disciples believed in him.

mainEvents.title: Raising of Lazarus
mainEvents.text: Jesus called in a loud voice, 'Lazarus, come out!'

mainEvents.title: Jesus Appears to Thomas
mainEvents.text: Stop doubting and believe.
